pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, May 17, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Paris, France

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Ottawa.

Closed to media.

Hamilton, Ontario

1:30 p.m.  The Prime Minister will meet with steel workers and hold a media availability. Minister of Foreign Affairs Chrystia Freeland, Minister of Finance Bill Morneau, Minister of Innovation, Science and Economic Development Navdeep Bains, Minister of Democratic Institutions Karina Gould, Minister of Seniors Filomena Tassi, Member of Parliament for Hamilton Eastâ€”Stoney Creek Bob Bratina and Member of Parliament for Sault Ste. Marie Terry Sheehan will be in attendance.

Stelco
386 Wilcox Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to present themselves at the main entrance (corner of Deprew Street and Industrial Road).
